Name: Le Commerçant (The Merchant)
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with prosecco.
Review: A balance between citrus and berry sweetness forms the heart of this cognac-based cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Mark Velasquez at The Merchant Hotel, Belfast, Northern Ireland.
Nutrition: One serving of Le Commerçant (The Merchant) contains 175 calories
